jobDescription: Senior Data Scientist, People Analytics Los Gatos, CaliforniaScience and AnalyticsNetflix is leading the video streaming business and, as we grow globally, we aim to build teams with very high concentrations of talent. Culture fit and performance is key to our DNA, however, so is having an extremely satisfied, motivated and happy workforce. To better help achieve this objective, we are now deep diving into people analytics.  We are looking for a creative, highly driven Data Scientist that will help lead our People Analytics efforts. You will provide insights on company health, diversity & inclusion, how to attract the most talented people. The opportunities are boundless. You will be partnering directly with Talent Acquisition and HR leadership, across both the Netflix Streaming company as well as the Netflix Customer Service.Responsibilities:Conduct data deep dives to identify areas of opportunity with respect to improving diversity and inclusionIdentify creative opportunities to measure employee satisfaction and engagement without relying too heavily on traditional data collection methods that provide friction to employees, like surveys.Provide expert advice and education in the usage and interpretation of data for the Talent and HR teams.Provide actionable data insights that will make meaningful differences.
